channel.title: Repetition on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Repetition on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Christmas on Repeat
item.description: [whitebox] Editor’s note: This is a special Wednesday morning issue, in an effort to get ahead of your holiday travel. We’ll be back to our normal Tuesday/Thursday schedule next week. [big]Today in Tedium: Every year, I have a tradition that I’ve followed pretty religiously for more than a decade. Whether in its original form or in its Mystery Science Theater 3000 send-up, I’ll watch the junk-culture film Santa Claus Conquers the Martians, despite knowing that the movie is perhaps one of the worst of all time.
